name: 楊元森
objective: 數值分析是人工智慧與機器學習的重要數理基礎。有了數值分析的知識，學習人工智慧與機器學習的過程將更為順利。本課程以電腦遊戲的方式，讓學員透過有趣的遊戲程式撰寫，體會數值分析的原理與重要性。本課程的目標以程式語言撰寫實用的電腦遊戲，學習數值分析的基本概念和方法。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to numerical analysis
Week 2: Hands-on exercise of spreadsheet and Python
Week 3: Euler method for trajectory of shell without air drag
Week 4: Spreadsheet calculation for explicit integration for trajectory of shell
Week 5: Runge-Kutta method for trajectory of shell air drag
Week 6: Visualization of trajectory using Python
Week 7: Online Euler method with visualization using Python
Week 8: Python object oriented programming for explicit integration
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Matrix multiplication and functions in Python
Week 11: Solving simple inverse problem in Excel
Week 12: Inversion problems and nonlinear least square in Python
Week 13: Frequency analysis and fast Fourier transform
Week 14: Introduction to AI
Week 15: Introduction to machine learning
Week 16: Final examination
Week 17: Selected projects and exercises (1)
Week 18: Selected projects and exercises (2)
